sentence: Home Depot, Inc. (HD) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 02, 2020.
A cash dividend payment of $1.5 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 17, 2020.
Shareholders who purchased HD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that HD has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $285.04, the dividend yield is 2.1%.
The previous trading day's last sale of HD was $285.04, representing a -2.7% decrease from the 52 week high of $292.95 and a 102.69% increase over the 52 week low of $140.63.
HD is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Lowe's Companies, Inc. (LOW) and Sherwin-Williams Company (SHW).
HD's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $10.91.
Zacks Investment Research reports HD's forecasted earnings growth in 2021 as 10.26%, compared to an industry average of -2.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the HD Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
